Revert Maomou's edits. Yes, it's a cult, but its status as such is too disputed to mention in the very beginning of the article. Additionally, a cult is a TYPE of "new religious movement".

Using "that" in sentences like those will make the text flow a lot more smoothly and the sentence structure make more immediate sense to people reading this article for the very first time.
Continued copyediting. (Also: Is "in theory" really a part of that central belief of Scientology? Sounds uncharacteristically moderate.)
